title: ESS 2023 & 2025 Data Analysis
description: Compared Georgetown ESS 2023 vs. 2025 to highlight shifts in engagement, services, and wellbeing; built reproducible R pipeline and gt tables.

title: UN Impact on Darfur Peace Project
description: Evaluated the UN Peacebuilding Fund's impact on peace and development in Darfur through gender-disaggregated analysis and causal forest modeling; conducted robust statistical testing and policy interpretation.

title: House Price Prediction
description: Developed a machine learning model to predict house prices using regression techniques; performed feature engineering, model tuning, and evaluation for high accuracy.
